snippet.title: Post Trauma | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Post Trauma launches on March 31, coming to Steam, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S . Check out the launch trailer just aired at The Mix!

Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1750030/Post_Trauma/
Wishlist on PlayStation - https://store.playstation.com/concept/10006435
Wishlist on Xbox - https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/post-trauma/9p3k5n1h0p08

Post Trauma is a modern interpretation of genre-defining survival horror classics. As you venture deeper into the unknown, you’ll strive to solve the mysteries of your unfamiliar surroundings, hoping to discover hidden truths while trying to stay alive.

Players will explore a terrifying, twisted reality that constantly unsettles as its story shifts and unravels.

Post Trauma theme composed by Myuu (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiSKnkKCKAQVxMUWpZQobuQ)
